overview:
Doug Engledow joined Sentilla Corporation in 2008 as Vice President, Sales. In this new role at Sentilla, Doug will concentrate on extending our sales channel and furthering strategic alliances that will expand the company’s worldwide market opportunities. He brings more than two decades of domestic and international experience with a background in strategic alliances, business development and executive sales management for both startup and public technology companies. Doug was most recently CAâ€™s vice president of worldwide channel development where he was responsible for OEM Sales and Strategic Alliances focused on the enterprise software market. Prior to that role, Doug was director of storage sales at CA, where he doubled software sales revenue of CAâ€™s storage product line year over year working with Fortune 100 enterprise customers. Earlier in his career, Doug was an award-winning sales executive with Veritas, Sun Microsystems and several successful startups.

Doug received his B.A. degree in Business Administration from Columbia College, and an A.B.S in Electronics from Joliet College. Doug has run five Chicago Marathons (best time 3:39.
